strapiPost.title: Downtown Rogers Celebrates Veterans In November’s Art On The Bricks
strapiPost.content:
Tonight from 4:30-7:30p, Downtown Rogers' Art on the Bricks will feature live music, artist demonstrations, and art exhibits commemorating the service and talent of military veterans in preparation for Veterans Day.

  • Art connects: Downtown Rogers’ monthly Art on the Bricks brings people to the city’s historical center to showcase NWA’s artists, craftsmen, and musicians with pop-up events, gallery exhibits, and live music. 
  • Art heals: November’s Art On The Bricks is in partnership with the Veterans Health Care System of the Ozarks and will celebrate our veterans while highlighting the power art can play as a form of therapy and a means of connection. 

Learn more about the event HERE.
